text: Abu al-Hussein al-Husseini al-Qurashi () was the fourth caliph of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant, starting from 30 November 2022. His position was announced by the ISIL spokesman Abu Omar al-Muhajir in an audio recording stating that the previous leader Abu al-Hasan al-Hashimi al-Qurashi was killed in battle. He was killed on 3 August 2023. Abu Hafs al-Hashimi al-Qurashi replaced him as the next caliph of Daesh. ==Notes== ==References== Category:20th-century births Category:2023 deaths Category:Caliphs Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Islamic State people Category:Iraqi military people Category:War criminals
title: Abu al-Hussein al-Husseini al-Qurashi
